出国退休可能会增加老年人的孤独感许多人梦想退休到一个温暖，更便宜的国家。但是，根据美国心理学会发表的研究，搬出国外的退休人员可能比留在祖国的退休风险更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/moving-moving-abroad-for-retirement-may-increase-loneliness-loneliness-for-for----------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/moving-abroad-for-retirement-may-increase-loneliness-loneliness-for--------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f0237b8-53d9-45c9-45c9-9ec3-a437c65186fc Thu, 13 Mar 2025 22:51:40 -0400 Moving abroad for retirement may increase loneliness for older adults
性爱可以帮助您睡得更好吗？根据一项试点研究，性活动（无论是合作还是独奏）可以提高睡眠效率并降低夜间清醒。该研究还表明，与性活动无关，共同睡眠的夫妻会体验到更多同步的REM睡眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/can-sex-help-you-sleep-better.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/can-sex-help-you-sleep-better.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fd5d821-6ecc-403e-b0e9-b0e9-1f11e2ff8a09 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 22:43:00 -0400 Can sex help you sleep better?
DeNoed Ultra-Low剂量CT为免疫功能低下的患者提供安全的肺炎诊断根据今天发表在《放射学：心胸部成像》上的一项研究中，脱落的超低剂量CT可以有效地诊断出使用标准CT的2％的标准CT辐射剂量的患者肺炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/denoise-ultra-low-dose-ct-formers-safe-pneumonia-dniaia-diaromonia-diarosnosis-for-mmunocompromprompromprompromprompromisis-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/denoise-ultra-low-dose-ct-ffers-safe-pneumonia-diarmonia-diarmonia-diarmonia-diange-for-mmonocompromprompromprompromisis-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2CE1F488-CD46-4F7D-B459-22C78FC3F3B6 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 22:39:43 -0400 Denoised ultra-low dose CT offers safe pneumonia diagnosis for immunocompromised patients
新的灵活助听器提供了无创的解决方案，以用于导电性听力损失Wake Forest大学医学院研究人员的一项研究强调了一种解决导电性听力损失的新方法。由生物医学工程助理教授穆罕默德·J·莫吉米（Mohammad J. https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/new-flexible herning-oid-offers-non-inn-invasive-solution-solution-for-conductive-conductive-conductive-horp-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/new-flexible herning-aid-offers-non-inn-invasive-solution-invasive-for-conductive-conductive-conductive-hess-hors-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da898708-0149-4e6b-a2b3-8a87772a347d5 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 22:32:24 -0400 New flexible hearing aid offers non-invasive solution for conductive hearing loss
研究发现青少年心理健康的极端哥德堡大学的一项研究显示，越来越多的青少年报告的精神福祉很高 - 但与此同时，那些挣扎的人的抑郁症状比以前的同龄人的抑郁症状高得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/study-finds-more-extremes-in-Ademendcent-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/study-finds-more-extremes-in-Ademendcent-mental-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc48a66e-2dab-4281-a9c1-3b4c4c4e6fdd7a Thu, 13 Mar 2025 22:28:15 -0400 Study finds more extremes in adolescent mental health
宾夕法尼亚州的研究发现，老年人对鸟流感的免疫力可能更强根据宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的新研究，先前暴露于特定类型的季节性流感病毒促进了针对H5N1禽流感病毒的交叉反应免疫。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/older-Adults-may-have-have-stronger-immunity-to-bird-flu-pen--flu-penn-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/older-Adults-may-have-have-stronger-immunity-to-bird-flu-flu-penn-pend-pend---------finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2F80144-6D5B-441C-441C-AF72-A2219CE5B731 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 22:21:21 -0400 Older adults may have stronger immunity to bird flu, Penn study finds
随着国会眼睛的尖刻，加利福尼亚州的医疗补助租借给医疗补助超支的34亿美元加利福尼亚州的医疗补助计划已从该州的普通基金中借了34亿美元，并且可能需要更多的资金来支付1500万收入和残疾居民的健康费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/california-borrows-2434-billion-for-medicaid-medicaid-overrrun-ashas-as-congress-gongress-eyes-eyes-steep-cuts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/california-borrows-2434-billion-billion-bill-medicaid-medicaid-overrrun-ashas as-as-as-congress-congress-congress-eyes-steep-cuts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71E8E93F-6F20-4B75-AD60-AD60-0411F64422D4 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 22:09:49 -0400 California borrows $3.4 billion for Medicaid overrun as Congress eyes steep cuts
在体重上挣扎？多吃豆类，切成红肉和跳过汽水富含全谷物，坚果，豆类和水果的饮食有助于降低肥胖风险，而红肉和含糖饮料会增加。研究人员审查了全球证据，以确定哪些食物支持或阻碍体重管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/struggling-with-with-weight-eat-more-legumes-cut-red-meat-meat-meat-meat-and-skip-soda.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/20250313/struggling-with-weight-eat-more-legumes-cut-red-red-meat-meat-meat-and-skip-skip-soda.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=830edc2e-f83b-4e81-8829-9da09d5321cf Thu, 13 Mar 2025 22:04:00 -0400 Struggling with weight? Eat more legumes, cut red meat, and skip soda
食源性疾病爆发爆发的背后是什么？ CDC发现关键风险和修复美国的细菌粮食生存暴发增加，而2014年至2022年之间的病毒暴发下降，环境污染作为主要原因。该研究强调了如何改善卫生能够减少病毒传播，但由于食物处理和温度不当而表现出持续的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/whate28099s-behind-behind-the-rise-in-rise-in--in-forede-illense-illness-creaste ure爆发c-cdc-uncovers-uncovers-key-key-kekey-key-strisks-＆fixes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/whate28099s-behind-behind-the-phind-the-rise-in-food-borne-illness-illness-creaste uck-cdc-uncovers-uncovers-key-isks-risks-risks-and-fixes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=D0BA7545-279A-4F04-4F04-8A5E-01FB3612113D Thu, 13 Mar 2025 21:13:00 -0400 What’s behind the rise in foodborne illness outbreaks? CDC uncovers key risks and fixes
研究表明，自闭症与自闭症相关的饮食如何导致严重的维生素缺乏症由于极端的食物选择性，自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）的儿童面临多种微量营养素缺陷的高风险，尤其是维生素A，D，B12和钙。这些缺陷可能导致严重的健康问题，例如身体体重正常的儿童，例如rike，视力丧失和免疫功能障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/study-shows-how-autism--------------------------投项目投入投入投入物https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/study-shows-how-autism------------------------投项目参差不齐 - vitamin-deficiencies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=311f98bd-bf55-4bf7-bf7-bf7-b1bb-5e56ffba2dbb Thu, 13 Mar 2025 20:40:00 -0400 Study shows how autism-linked picky eating causes serious vitamin deficiencies
